Other.Description: Still want to handle a service that is not described
CompanyStockService.Title: Company Stock Service
CompanyStockService.Description: Assist traders in managing, buying, and selling their company stocks efficiently.
RegistrationService.Title: Vehicle Registration
RegistrationService.Description: Facilitate the official registration process of vehicles, ensuring all legal requirements are met.
AcceleratedRegistrationService.Title: Accelerated Vehicle Registration
AcceleratedRegistrationService.Descripti: A quick and efficient registration service for those who need their vehicles registered promptly.
MOTServiceLightVehicle.Title: MOT service
MOTServiceLightVehicle.Description: A legally required inspection to check and guarantee the road safety, environmental aspects and registration of your vehicle.
MOTServiceHeavyVehicle.Title: MOT service
MOTServiceHeavyVehicle.Description: A legally required inspection to check and guarantee the road safety, environmental aspects and registration of your vehicle.
MOTServiceAgriculture.Title: MOT service
MOTServiceAgriculture.Description: A legally required inspection to check and guarantee the road safety, environmental aspects and registration of agricultural vehicles.
ControlDeviceService.Title: Control Device Service
ControlDeviceService.Description: Installation, maintenance, and repair of vehicle control devices to ensure optimal functionality.
GasInstallationService.Title: Gas Installation Service
GasInstallationService.Description: Expert installation and servicing of gas systems in vehicles, ensuring safety and compliance with regulations.
MopedConversionService.Title: Moped Conversion Service
MopedConversionService.Description: Convert your standard moped to meet specific requirements or enhance its features.
DismantlingService.Title: Vehicle Dismantling Service
DismantlingService.Description: Professional dismantling of vehicles for parts reuse, recycling, or disposal while ensuring environmental safety.
TaxiComputerService.Title: Taxi Computer Service
TaxiComputerService.Description: Installation and maintenance of computer systems specifically designed for taxis, enhancing operational efficiency.
LicensePlateManufactureService.Title: License Plate Manufacturing
LicensePlateManufactureService.Descripti: Custom manufacture of license plates, adhering to local regulations and specifications.
Inspection.Title: Inspection
Inspection.Description: We check essential parts of your vehicle, such as brakes, tires and fluids, to ensure your journey is safe and uninterrupted.
SmallMaintenance.Title: Small maintenance
SmallMaintenance.Description: Basic maintenance services to ensure your vehicle remains in optimal condition, covering essential checks and minor repairs.
GreatMaintenance.Title: Great maintenance
GreatMaintenance.Description: Comprehensive maintenance services covering a wide range of checks and repairs, ensuring longevity and performance of your vehicle.
AirConditioningMaintenance.Title: AirConditioning maintenance
AirConditioningMaintenance.Description: Servicing and repairing vehicle air conditioning systems, ensuring optimal cooling and comfort.
SeasonalTireChange.Title: Seasonal tire change
SeasonalTireChange.Description: Replace and fit tires appropriate for the upcoming season, ensuring safety and optimal performance.
